posts.postText:
Well there is no section for goodbyes, so imma dump this here

With my ever-decreasing playtime and the soon to be deletion of flood, I are officially announcing my departure from the NNJG community. To start off (because I'm sure this will be the first question for many of you) I will still be doing the giveaway. You'll still be able to catch me on Steam [Dick Nixon], World of Failcraft [REDACTED@REDACTED], XBOX Live [Jedi Nixon], and coming soon the PlayStation Network. Ben, I still really don't like you all that much, you're changing too much shit for too many non-existent reasons. Gash, you're cool but you're too hidden in the shadows and not doing enough of anything for my taste. Bird, you're still the fucking man. Mak, Dark, and Deth, you're the only Canadians I wouldn't slaughter IRL. Kryzoid, good luck keeping the kiddies in line. Bewm, good times in flood. Bearcats, I still want to know what the hell that weapon was gonna be. 

And without further adieu, I leave you with the greatest pic I ever did seed:
 http://img227.imageshack.us/img227/1430/vxgs9v.png

All I can say is....   NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
I am sad to see you leave. Farewell sweet Dick,  we  I hardly knew ye.
Wait, what is this about flood?

what

me and punk don't get a mention?

Anyways about the ben changing things for no particular reason, I agree strongly with it.

A quick question
If you care so much about flood, why don't you play it?
Ben you derp, he doesn't play it because the server is empty.

We should all join the flood server at the same time
Dick stop being a dick join the flood

It's sad to see you leaving, we had some good times back on flood when it used to always be populated.
I'll have to add you on xbox or something, or maybe yeah; I'll see you around on steam.

Have fun with your future ventures :)

No! (I'm late, but hey) I'll miss you Dick. If they keep flood up, you should still play on it. (which they really need to keep flood up)

I didn't know you that much, but you're still fucking awesome.
We're doing our best to clean up the forums and the community in general, but flood is staying, so please stay Dick Nixon, we'll try to get it populated ;_;
I miss President Nixon, he was  a great man except for that whole Watergate thing, but hey, he did alot for my country and I greatly respect him.  Oh wait, is this the wrong guy?
